button.name: set_qty_by_script
button.confirm: This will adjust product stock according to this delivery.

xpath.div: Make sure you update cases in order.

div.div: Note : If your order weight is smaller than 68.04 kg (150 lb), It consider as a small shipment.

field.name: help
field.p: This menu gives you the full traceability of inventory operations on a specific product. You can filter on the product to see all the past movements for the product.
